text: Pablo Maximiliano Miguel Coronel Vidoz, also known as Pablito Ruiz and Pablo Ruiz, born on 4 May 1975 in Buenos Aires, Argentina, is an Argentine singer, actor and dancer. His musical career began at age 10. == Discography == === Studio albums === * Pablo Ruiz (released 1985) * Un ángel (1988) * Océano (1989) * Espejos azules (1990) * Irresistible (1992) * 60/90 (1994) * Aire (1997) * Was it something that I didn't say? (1999) * Jamás (2001) * Necesito tus besos (2003) * Demasiado tarde (2005) * Renacer (2009) ==References== ==Other websites== Official Website Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Buenos Aires
title: Pablo Ruiz (singer)
